## clampH variable

Similar to `clamp`<!-- -->, but calls `ensureHue()` to fold (instead of clamping) the hue into \[0,1\] interval.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clampH: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, src: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, alpha?: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
